<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Fireworks Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3247) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Fireworks Technician](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=119)

**Prerequisites**
[Firework Technician Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3245); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You’re particularly adept at crafting fireworks, allowing you to create more powerful fireworks than you otherwise could. When creating fireworks displays using your advanced alchemy benefits, you create 2 fireworks displays for each of your daily consumables that you expend.
name: Expert Fireworks Crafter
prerequisite: Firework Technician Dedication; Expert in Crafting
